hooks: "my doctor said it was normal aging pain...until i found the x-ray from 6 years ago they ignored"
"i thought my feet were supposed to hurt at 65...until my neighbor showed me what her doctor found"
csv:
Hook,Slide 1,Slide 2,Slide 3,Slide 4,Slide 5
"my doctor said it was normal aging pain...until i found the x-ray from 6 years ago they ignored","they said 'everyone your age has foot pain' and sent me home with tylenol","spent $400 on 'comfort shoes' and did their stretches for 8 months","found my old x-ray showing early signs they missed completely","turns out 92% of 'aging pain' is actually treatable with Vibit's technology","now i can garden for hours - don't let them dismiss your pain as 'normal'"
"i thought my feet were supposed to hurt at 65...until my neighbor showed me what her doctor found","'just part of getting older' they said while barely looking at my feet","wasted a year doing 'gentle walks' and taking otc pain meds","my neighbor's podiatrist found the real issue in 10 minutes","Vibit's scan showed the exact pressure points causing my pain","walking 2 miles daily now - aging doesn't have to mean suffering"
